name: Endiana Jones: Kingdom of Time
description:
You have found the crown jewel of the Kingdom of Time! But after taking the crown, you set off the traps in the cave you are exploring. Escape with the treasure before the walls close in on you! Hurry up, you don't have much time...

Created by Osloyy, Khris "MarcialBot" Marcial, Nathan Ballay (natedog334), HOKFMK, and Zaven Kazandjian for the Winter Jam by SoloDevelopment (2023).

Theme: The end is near

Controls:

Move - WASD

Jump - Space

Credits:

Art: Osloyy and HOKFMK

Design: Nathan Ballay (natedog334) and Zaven Kazandjian

Programming: Nathan Ballay (natedog334) and Zaven Kazandjian

Sound/Music: Khris "MarcialBot" Marcial

Character Voice: Khris "MarcialBot" Marcial and Phil Cosico
